reviewText: I found the first part of this DVD disappointing.  It had, for me, too many travelogue-like scenes of the area where St. Clare lived and not enough substance of her life and spirituality  But I do like very much the second program on the disc, where nuns (or a nun) speak of their understanding of their mission in life and the spirituality that undergirds that mission.

I have had  three DVD of st Francis & st Care,
And I love  this DVD very much. This is very good DVD.
